hero.title: Welcome to Mero Library
hero.subtitle: Nepal's Premier Digital Library Platform
hero.description: Discover the rich heritage of Nepali literature through our extensive collection of books, authors, and literary content. Join thousands of readers worldwide in exploring the beauty of Nepali culture and language.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Mero Library started as a small dream. We saw that Nepal has a rich literary heritage, but it was not easily accessible to modern readers. So, we decided to build this digital platform.
story.paragraph2: At first, it was a small project. We began from home, scanning a few books and putting them online. But many readers loved it, and our project grew.
story.paragraph3: Today, we have 50+ books, information on 30+ authors, and readers from many countries using our site. This is a big achievement for us.

bookCollection.title: Book Collection
bookCollection.description: We collect a wide range of Nepali books—from old classics to modern works. All these books are available to read online.

authorInfo.title: Author Information
authorInfo.description: We provide detailed information about famous Nepali authors, their works, and their contributions.

globalAccess.title: Global Access
globalAccess.description: We make Nepali literature accessible to Nepali speakers and learners all over the world.

community.title: Community Building
community.description: We are building a community of Nepali literature lovers where everyone can share their experiences.

future.title: Building the Future of Reading!
future.paragraph1: Currently, we have 50+ books and information on 30+ Nepali authors, and our reader community is growing in many countries. We are excited about the journey ahead and hope our platform will reach even more literature lovers.
future.paragraph2: Unlike traditional models focused on selling books, our main goal is to start a book rental service—like a physical library, but digitally accessible at your doorstep.
future.paragraph3: We also warmly welcome book donations. If you have already-read books and want to share them with others, you can contribute to this growing literary movement.
future.tagline: Let's make Nepali literature accessible to everyone—anytime, anywhere.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To preserve, promote, and make accessible the rich literary heritage of Nepal to readers worldwide, fostering cultural understanding and appreciation for Nepali literature.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the leading digital platform for Nepali literature, connecting readers with authentic Nepali content and preserving our cultural heritage for future generations.
